revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Y-cam |model=Cube |revision=(YCW005) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price=199.99 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/06/2013 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Anbash |manuf_model=NC215 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=camera |fcc_id=V4FCUBE |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Grain Media |cpu1_model=GM8125 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QF-BCF7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=microSD |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3070 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ycam |default_ssid_regex=^ycam$ |default_ip=192.168.1.150 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:E0:4C |oui_eth= }} [http://www.y-cam.com/y-cam-cube/ Product page]
[http://www.y-cam.com/docs/Y-cam-Cube-Manual-EN.pdf Manual] "ABNCMAIN1VB" is silkscreened on the SoC board. :"ABNC215OV77251VC" (or something) is silkscreened on the camera, Ethernet, and microSD board. :"JW801M0 Ver:1.3" is silkscreened on the wireless module. A label on the module shows an FCC ID of XONSR806000 and a model of JW-8XXMN. :"ABNC215IRLED1VC" is silkscreened on the IR LED board. :"ABNC215PBOX1VC" is silkscreened on the Ethernet adapter (PoE?) board. The camera does not have a standard RJ-45 jack.. :Board P/Ns clearly indicate '''Anbash''' ('''Shenzhen Anbash Technology''') manufacture This device is presumed to be an '''Anbash''' NC215. This device is using a GM8125EL-QC SoC. :K4T1G164QF-BCE7 / K4T1G164QF-BCF7 128MB RAM '''Y-cam''''s specs state the device can handle a microSD card with capacity up to 64GB. The manual shows the sample SSID (w/ Ad-Hoc mode) as '''ycam''' (this is presumed to be accurate...). YCW005 is noted as the White model. YCB005 is the Black model. The FCC label shows the device with an 00:E0:4C ('''Ralink''') OUI.. this is, again, presumed to be correct (for the wireless interface).
